string.name: wp_todo_tasks_title
string.context: Label on tab bar for the To Do list

string.name: wp_todo_changes_title
string.context: Label on tab bar for the To Do Changes list

string.name: wp_todo_error_loading
string.context: Label in To Do list saying your to do tasks failed to load

resources.string: Hubo un error al cargar sus tareas.

string.name: wp_todo_title
string.context: Title for To Do activity

string.name: wp_todo_empty
string.context: Message shown when user has nothing listed in To Do.

resources.string: No tiene información nueva en el archivo

string.name: wp_todo_service_puttask_failed
string.context: Toast message that is displayed when there are errors updating the status of a task.

resources.string: Ups, no se pudo actualizar su tarea.

string.name: wp_todo_error_loading_time_zone
string.context: Label in To Do list saying your time zone settings failed to load

resources.string: Hubo un error al cargar su configuración de husos horarios.

string.name: wp_generic_done
string.context: Button used widely and generally. Select value and exit an activity or dialog

string.name: wp_generic_cancel
string.context: Button closes a dialog without taking any action

string.name: wp_generic_cancel_task
string.context: VoiceOver text for canceling a task

string.name: wp_generic_confirm_task
string.context: VoiceOver text for confirming a task

string.name: wp_generic_undo_task
string.context: VoiceOver text for undoing a task

string.name: wp_generic_not_actionable_accessibility
string.context: VoiceOver text indicate the current task is not actionable

string.name: wp_todo_reload
string.context: Text to be displayed on button that forces a reload upon clicking

string.name: wp_todo_ed_banner
string.context: Snackbar (banner) shown to patient in To Do activity when patient is in ED.

resources.string: Quizás sus tareas no apliquen en urgencias. Pregúntele a su equipo de atención si debe completarlas hoy.

string.name: wp_todo_admission_banner
string.context: Snackbar (banner) shown to patient in To Do activity when patient is admitted.

resources.string: Se remueven las tareas asignadas por su equipo de atención mientras está en el hospital. Hable con su equipo de atención si tiene alguna pregunta.

string.name: wp_todo_reminder_group_morning
string.context: Title of the released category. This is the category for Morning tasks. It is displayed at many places like activity title, tasks list and personalization activity.

string.name: wp_todo_reminder_group_midday
string.context: Title of the released category. This is the category for around Noon tasks. It is displayed at many places like activity title, tasks list and personalization activity.

string.name: wp_todo_reminder_group_afternoon
string.context: Title of the released category. This is the category for Afternoon tasks. It is displayed at many place like activity title, tasks list and personalization activity.

string.name: wp_todo_reminder_group_evening
string.context: Title of the released category. This is the category for Evening tasks. It is displayed at many places like activity title, tasks list and personalization activity.

string.name: wp_todo_reminder_group_bedtime
string.context: Title of the released category. This is the category for Bedtime tasks. It is displayed at many places like activity title, tasks list and personalization activity.

string.name: wp_todo_reminder_group_as_needed
string.context: Title of the released category. This is the category for As Needed tasks. It is displayed at many places like activity title, tasks list and personalization activity.

string.name: wp_todo_reminder_group_byendofday
string.context: Title of the released category. This is the category for Any Time tasks. It is displayed at many places like activity title, tasks list and personalization activity.

string.name: wp_todo_reminder_group_other
string.context: Title of the released category. This is the category for non specified time the day tasks. It is displayed at many places like activity title, tasks list and personalization activity.

string.name: wp_todo_complete
string.context: Shows in today header under completion percentage for today

string.name: wp_todo_nice_work
string.context: Message shown when user has finished all tasks.

string.name: wp_todo_tasks_completed
string.context: Message shown when user has finished all tasks (details).

resources.string: Todas las tareas para hoy han sido completadas.

string.name: wp_todo_thanks
string.context: Message shown when user has finished all tasks, but skipped one.

string.name: wp_todo_no_more_tasks
string.context: Message shown when user has finished all tasks, but skipped one (details).

string.name: wp_todo_no_tasks_today
string.context: Message shown when user has no tasks for today.

string.name: wp_todo_progressArc_accessibilityText
string.context: Accessibility text for the progress arc that shows the percentage of finished tasks due today.

string.name: wp_todo_overdue_task_list_header
string.context: Header text shown above a patients overdue task list.

string.name: wp_todo_future_task_list_header
string.context: Header text shown above a patients future task list.

string.name: wp_todo_overdue_task_list_link
string.context: Text link shown in to do jump a user to their overdue tasks list. In this case none of the overdue tasks in the list are actionable by the patient, eg. health maintenance, expired education, etc.

string.name: wp_todo_overdue_task_list_link_with_actionable_tasks
string.context: Text link shown in to do jump a user to their overdue tasks list. %1$@ is the number of tasks in the overdue task list that the patient can take action on, eg. mark education as review, immunization as complete, etc.

string.name: wp_todo_future_task_list_link
string.context: Text link shown in to do jump a user to their future tasks list.

string.name: wp_todo_education_status_understanding
string.context: Indicated that the response to an education task was understanding of the material

string.name: wp_todo_education_status_questions
string.context: Indicated that the response to an education task was questions about the material

string.name: wp_todo_meds_common_name
string.context: Medication description when the med has a common name. Shown on generic medication tasks as a subtitle. %1$@ is the meds common name

string.name: wp_todo_meds_generic_name
string.context: Medication description when the med has a generic name. Shown on generic medication tasks as a subtitle. %1$@ is the meds generic nameas.

string.name: wp_todo_meds_anticoag_order_instructions
string.context: A warning message for anticoagulation orders because the instructions may differ, %1$@ is the original instructions

resources.string: Tomar según las instrucciones de la clínica de anticoagulación. Instrucciones: %1$@

string.name: wp_todo_meds_empty_names_default_title
string.context: In the case of bad build, it is possible for a medication to arrive to the client with an empty name. In this case, we want to display a configuration warning as the title.

resources.string: Esta tarea de medicamentos no está configurada correctamente

string.name: wp_todo_meds_empty_default_description
string.context: In the case of bad or broken build, it is possible for a medication to arrive to the client with an empty description. In this case, we want to instruct the patient on how to rectify this.

resources.string: Comuníquese con su equipo de cuidado para eliminar o corregir esta tarea.

string.name: wp_todo_healthAdvisory_pending_update
string.context: Text shown after user marks a Health Advisory as completed, and the Health Advisory is currently pending

resources.string: Pendiente de revisión por personal médico

string.name: wp_todo_healthAdvisory_not_due
string.context: The status text for a health advisory task that is not due

string.name: wp_todo_healthAdvisory_not_due_until
string.context: The status text for a task that is not due until a date. %1$@ is the date the task is due.

string.name: wp_todo_healthAdvisory_not_due_yet
string.context: The status text for a health advisory task that is not yet due

string.name: wp_todo_healthAdvisory_last_done_on
string.context: The status text for a task that was completed in the past. %1$@ is the completion date (long format: En-US Nov 23, 1937) that the task was done.

string.name: wp_todo_healthAdvisory_overdue_since
string.context: The status text for a task that is overdue since a date. %1$@ is the date the task became overdue.

string.name: wp_todo_healthAdvisory_due_since
string.context: The status text for a task that has been due since a date. %1$@ is the date the task became due.

string.name: wp_todo_healthAdvisory_due_on
string.context: The status text for a task that is due on a date. %1$@ is the date the task is due (long format: En-US Nov 23, 1937).

string.name: wp_todo_healthAdvisory_due_soon
string.context: The status text for a task that is due soon.

string.name: wp_todo_healthAdvisory_completed
string.context: The status text for a task that has been completed.

string.name: wp_todo_healthAdvisory_completed_on
string.context: The status text for a task that has been completed on a date. %1$@ is the date (long format: En-US Nov 23, 1937) the task was completed.

string.name: wp_todo_healthAdvisory_addressed
string.context: The status text for a task that has been addressed.

string.name: wp_todo_healthAdvisory_addressed_on
string.context: The status text for a task that has been addressed on a date. %1$@ is the date (long format: En-US Nov 23, 1937) the task was addressed.

string.name: wp_todo_healthAdvisory_postponed
string.context: The status text for a task that has been postponed.

string.name: wp_todo_healthAdvisory_postponed_until
string.context: The status text for a task that has been postponed until a date. %1$@ is the date the task was postponed to.

string.name: wp_todo_healthAdvisory_last_submitted
string.context: The status text for a pending health advisory task. %1$@ is the completion date that user submitted

string.name: wp_todo_hm_schedule_appt_accessibility
string.context: Accessibility Text read by voiceover stating the button is a appointment scheduling button

string.name: wp_todo_healthAdvisory_schedule_button_title
string.context: The schedule button title string

string.name: wp_todo_healthAdvisory_mark_as_complete_button_title
string.context: The mark as complete button title string

string.name: wp_todo_contact_clinic_for_hm_request_appointment
string.context: Alert message to request an appointment for the health advisory tasks.

resources.string: Por favor póngase en contacto con su clínica para solicitar una cita.

string.name: wp_todo_healthAdvisory_scheduled_appointment_for
string.context: The status text for a task that is scheduled for a date. %1$@ is the date for that appointment.

string.name: wp_todo_changes_header
string.context: Label on top of To Do Changes list explaining the page

resources.string: Esta página muestra los últimos cambios a sus tareas y acciones notables.

string.name: wp_todo_no_changes
string.context: Label in To Do Changes list saying you have not changes

resources.string: No hay cambios recientes en sus tareas por hacer.

string.name: wp_todo_error_loading_changes
string.context: Label in To Do Changes list saying your to do changes failed to load

resources.string: Hubo un error al cargar sus cambios de tareas.

string.name: wp_todo_change_task_added_title
string.context: Label for a Task Added item

string.name: wp_todo_change_task_added_detail
string.context: Label for a Task Added detail item. Bulleted item Param 1 is the task name

string.name: wp_todo_change_message_sent_title
string.context: Label for a message sent action item title when the message wasn't to a single recipient

string.name: wp_todo_change_message_sent_recipient_default_title
string.context: Default name for a provider type/role if one is not found in title

string.name: wp_todo_change_message_sent_recipient_default_message
string.context: Default name for a provider type/role if one is not found in sentence

string.name: wp_todo_change_message_sent_recipient_title
string.context: Label for a message sent action item title when the message was to a single recipient Param 1 is the provider type/role

string.name: wp_todo_change_message_sent_detail
string.context: Label for a message sent action detail item. Bulleted item Param 1 is the provider name

string.name: wp_todo_changes_activity
string.context: Activity name for to do changes

string.name: wp_todo_changes_details_why_the_change
string.context: Why this change header in the todo change details activity

string.name: wp_todo_changes_details_next_steps
string.context: Next steps header in the todo change details activity

string.name: wp_todo_changes_details_task_changes
string.context: Message header to listing changes to to do tasks

resources.string: Se han realizado los siguientes cambios a sus tareas por hacer:

string.name: wp_todo_changes_details_message_sent_clinic
string.context: Message header letting the patient know this change info was sent to their clinic

resources.string: Hemos enviado esta información a su clínica. Por favor comuníquese con su clínica si tiene preguntas específicas.

string.name: wp_todo_changes_details_message_sent_recipient
string.context: Message header letting the patient know this change info was sent to a recipient Param 1 is the recipient type/role

resources.string: Hemos enviado esta información a su %1$@. Por favor comuníquese con su clínica si tiene preguntas específicas.

string.name: wp_todo_change_provider_pcp
string.context: Appears as the provider type for general primary care providers in the care team details

string.name: wp_todo_change_accessibility_unread
string.context: Accessiblity text for the unread icon

resources.string: Ud. todavía no ha abierto este elemento

string.name: wp_todo_change_send_message
string.context: Button to send a message to the provider in the provider widget

string.name: wp_todo_reminders_help_text
string.context: Help text for To Do Reminders

resources.string: Los tiempos aquí controlan cuándo recibirá recordatorios.

string.name: wp_todo_manage_reminders
string.context: Text that is displayed to user to launch the manage reminders activity. This is available as menu option from To Do activity.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_group_task_section_title
string.context: This is the title of the list of all the tasks that the user has for a notification group. This is displayed when the user launches the personalization activity for a group.

string.name: wp_todo_manage_notification_groups_empty
string.context: This text is displayed to the user when he is in the personalize time activity for a group but there are no tasks available for that group

resources.string: No tiene tareas con recordatorios que pueda cambiar

string.name: wp_todo_manage_notification_groups_no_access
string.context: Text which is displayed to the user if the user does not have security to view the patient's reminders.

resources.string: No tiene acceso para administrar los recordatorios de tareas de este paciente.

string.name: wp_todo_save_menu
string.context: Text on the button which when pressed would cause the data to save in that activity.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_save_failed
string.context: Message in toast to tell the user that the personalization time could not be saved and that the user can try again.

resources.string: Hubo un error al guardar cambios. Por favor intente de nuevo más tarde.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_reminder_act_title
string.context: Title of the activity which configures To Do notification settings.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_reminder_schedule_act_title
string.context: Title of the activity which displays all the notification group.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_notification_edit_text
string.context: Text in the label which appears near the personalized time suggesting user that he can edit this time

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_service_load_notification_settings_failed
string.context: Toast message is displayed when there are errors in loading notification settings.

resources.string: ¡Ups! No se pudo obtener su configuración

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_service_save_notification_settings_failed
string.context: Toast message is displayed when there are errors in loading notification settings.

resources.string: ¡Ups! No se pudo guardar su configuración

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_onoff_unable_to_load_settings
string.context: Label message is displayed when there are errors in loading notification settings.

resources.string: No se pudo cargar su configuración. Por favor, inténtelo de nuevo.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_onoff_no_security
string.context: Label message is displayed when user doesn't have security to modify notification settings.

resources.string: No está autorizado para editar estas configuraciones.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_onoff_send_me_reminders
string.context: Row title for the setting to receive reminders.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_onoff_send_patient_reminders
string.context: Row title for the setting to receive reminders for a given patient. Param 1: Patient Name

resources.string: Envíame los recordatorios de tareas de %1$@.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_onoff_reminder_off_helptext
string.context: Description explaining that the user is currently not receiving task notifications.

resources.string: Actualmente no recibe recordatorios de tareas.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_onoff_reminder_off_helptext_patient
string.context: Description explaining that the user is currently not receiving task notifications for a given patient. Param 1: Patient Name

resources.string: Actualmente no está recibiendo los recordatorios de tarea de %1$@.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_frequency_section_title
string.context: Section title for frequency related settings for reminders.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_frequency_when_my_tasks_due
string.context: Row title for the setting to receive reminders when tasks are due.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_frequency_when_patient_tasks_due
string.context: Row title for the setting to receive reminders when tasks are due for a given patient. Param 1: Patient Name

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_frequency_once_daily
string.context: Row title for the setting to receive reminders once per day.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_frequency_remind_me_at
string.context: Row title for the setting to set time when to receive daily reminder.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_task_type_section_title
string.context: Section title for task type related settings for reminders.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_task_type_general
string.context: Row title for the setting to receive reminders for general task.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_task_type_education
string.context: Row title for the setting to receive reminders for education task.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_task_type_medications
string.context: Row title for the setting to receive reminders for medication task.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_task_type_questionnaires
string.context: Row title for the setting to receive reminders for questionnaire task.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_task_type_flowsheet
string.context: Row title for the setting to receive reminders for flowsheet task.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_task_type_appointments
string.context: Row title for the setting to receive reminders for appointment task.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_notification_settings_helptext
string.context: Description explaining that the notification settings only apply to user's own devices.

resources.string: Esta configuración sólo se aplica a las notificaciones en su dispositivo móvil. No aplicará a otros que tienen acceso a su cuenta.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_notification_settings_helptext_patient
string.context: Description explaining that the notification settings only apply to user's own devices when viewing a patient's settings. Param 1: Patient Name

resources.string: Esta configuración sólo se aplica a notificaciones en su dispositivo móvil. No afectará a %1$@ o a otros que tengan acceso a la cuenta de %1$@.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_schedule_manage_my_schedule
string.context: Row title for the link to open manage reminder schedule activity.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_schedule_manage_patient_schedule
string.context: Row title for the link to open manage reminder schedule activity of a given patient. Param 1: Patient Name

resources.string: Administrar el horario de recordatorios de %1$@

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_schedule_helptext
string.context: Description explaining what manage reminder schedule means.

resources.string: Cambiar cuándo se envíen los recordatorios para usted y otros que tienen acceso a su cuenta.

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_schedule_helptext_patient
string.context: Description explaining what manage reminder schedule means. Param 1: Patient Name

resources.string: Cambiar cuándo le enviamos recordatorios a %1$@, usted, y a otros que tienen acceso a la cuenta de %1$@.

plurals.name: wp_todo_personalize_schedule_bucket_description
plurals.context: Description saying how many tasks a patient has in a given time of day (e.g., morning, evening, etc.). Param 1: Task Count

string.name: wp_todo_personalize_timepicker_cancel
string.context: Button closes a dialog without taking any action.

string.name: wp_todo_alert_timezone_diff_header
string.context: Header message on the time zone difference pop up

string.name: wp_todo_alert_timezone_diff
string.context: Alert text if user's time zone is different to the time zone set for scheduled reminders, Param 1 is the notification time zone name

resources.string: Su dispositivo ahora usa \'%1$@\'. ¿Quiere que sus recordatorios usen este huso horario?

string.name: wp_todo_alert_timezone_diff_subject
string.context: Alert text if user's time zone is different to the time zone set for scheduled reminders, Param 1 is the notification time zone name, Param 2 is the patient's name

resources.string: Su dispositivo ahora usa \'%1$@\'. ¿Quiere que los recordatorios de %2$@ usen este huso horario?

string.name: wp_todo_alert_timezone_diff_toast
string.context: Toast text if user's time zone is different to the time zone set for scheduled reminders and user have no security to change it. Param 1 is the mobile phone's current time zone name, Param 2 is the notification time zone

resources.string: Su dispositivo usa \'%1$@\'. Las fechas de vencimiento de sus tareas aún usan \'%2$@\'.

string.name: wp_todo_alert_timezone_diff_toast_subject
string.context: Toast text if user's time zone is different to the time zone set for scheduled reminders and user have no security to change it. Param 1 is the mobile phone's current time zone name, Param 2 is the patient's name, Param 3 is the notification time zone

resources.string: Su dispositivo usa \'%1$@\'. Las fechas de vencimiento de las tareas de %2$@ aún usan \'%3$@\'.

string.name: wp_todo_alert_timezone_diff_update
string.context: Button text to update the notification time zone. Param 1 is the time zone we are going to use

string.name: wp_todo_alert_timezone_diff_dismiss
string.context: Button test to continue on current time zone. Param 1 is the current time zone we are using

string.name: wp_todo_service_puttimezone_failed
string.context: Toast message that is displayed when there are errors updating the time zone settings.

resources.string: Ups, algo ha fallado. No podemos actualizar la configuración de su huso horario.

string.name: wp_todo_service_puttimezone_notification_succeed
string.context: Toast message that is displayed when updating the notification time zone settings succeed. Param 1 is the patient's notification time zone

resources.string: Los recordatorios de tareas ahora usan el huso horario actual de %1$@.

string.name: wp_todo_title_notificationtimezone
string.context: Title of a row with contains the notification time zone

string.name: wp_todo_toggle_alertwhentimezonediffers
string.context: Title of a row with a switch to turn on notifications for time zone changes.

resources.string: Avisar cuando cambia el huso horario

string.name: wp_todo_toggle_alertwhentimezonediffers_subject
string.context: Title of a row with a switch to turn on notifications for a patient's time zone changes. %1$@ is patient's name.

resources.string: Avisar cuando cambia el huso horario de %1$@

string.name: wp_todo_toggle_alertwhentimezonediffers_footer
string.context: Footer description for time zone alert onoff section.

resources.string: Active esta configuración si quiere una notificación cuando el huso horario de sus notificaciones sea distinto del huso horario de su dispositivo.

string.name: wp_todo_toggle_alertwhentimezonediffers_footer_subject
string.context: Footer description for time zone alert onoff section. %1$@ is patient's name.

resources.string: Active esta configuración si quiere una notificación cuando el huso horario de las notificaciones de %1$@ sea distinto del huso horario de su dispositivo.

string.name: wp_todo_settings_footer_servicefailed
string.context: Footer description for when notification settings fail to save.

resources.string: No se pueden guardar sus configuraciones. Por favor inténtelo de nuevo más tarde.

string.name: wp_todo_timezoneselection_footer
string.context: Footer description for time zone selection section.

resources.string: Todos recordatorios de tarea se enviarán según el huso horario que ha seleccionado. Recordatorios diarios se enviarán según su huso horario local.

string.context: Ghost text for search bar.

string.context: Header message for the current time zone row

string.context: Header message for the current selected time zone row

string.context: Header message for the current selected time zone row. %1$@ is patient's name.

string.context: Header message for the section contains other available time zones

string.context: Message shown when there are no available time zones to select from.

string.context: Tooltip for check mark icon for a selected time zone.

string.context: Accessibility label for the background button that is hidden behind a popup to allow the user to dismiss the pop-up

string.context: Text the button which confirms a user's selection

string.context: Checkbox option displayed to user to enable the visibility of finished tasks

string.context: Label read in voiceover mode describing setting to enable visibility of finished tasks when it is on

string.context: Label read in voiceover mode describing setting to enable visibility of finished tasks when it is off

string.name: wp_todo_overdue_label
string.context: Due date label for overdue task. %1$@ is for the due date, %2$@ is for the notification group, if any, if any

string.context: Displayed in subtext for an overdue task Param 1: Due Date

string.context: Label that indicates an overdue task was due yesterday. %1$@ is for the notification group, if any

string.context: Due time of the task. %1$@ is time for the task instance.

string.context: Text for undo button for tasks in todo activity

string.context: Text for done button for tasks in todo activity

string.name: wp_todo_task_not_done
string.context: Text for not done button for tasks in todo activity

string.name: wp_todo_appointment_echeckin
string.context: Text for echeck-in button for appointments in todo activity

string.name: wp_todo_default_visit_string
string.context: The default title for a visit if the visit's name was otherwise blank

string.name: wp_todo_appointment_panel_visit_title_two_component_appointments
string.context: The title displayed for a panel of appointments when the panel appointment itself does not have a display name. Instead, we construct the visit title name using the visit titles of the first two child visits in the panel. %1$@ is the visit title of the first child visit. %2$@ is the visit title of the second child visit.

string.name: wp_todo_appointment_panel_visit_title_more_than_two_component_appointments
string.context: The title displayed for a panel of appointments when the panel appointment itself does not have a display name. Instead, we construct the visit title name using the visit title of the first child visit and then displaying how many other child visits there are. %1$@ is the visit title of the first child visit. %2$@ is the number of the remaining visits in the panel appointment.

string.name: wp_todo_task_flowsheet_threshold
string.context: Text displaying the flowsheet progress and threshold value in To Do list for a Flowsheet Threshold task. For example, if this is a step count flowsheet threshold task, then this string would appear as '325 / 5000', meaning patient has walked 325 steps out of 5000 steps so far. WARNING: The 2 placeholders MUST be present in translated string. %1$@ is a numeric value representing current progress. This value will always appear formatted differently (bigger font) than rest of the string. %2$@ is a numeric value representing threshold value.

string.name: wp_todo_task_flowsheet_threshold_accessibility
string.context: Accessibility Text read by voiceover stating current progress value and threshold in To Do list for a Flowsheet Threshold task. %1$@ is the numeric progress value. %2$@ is numeric flowsheet threshold value.

string.name: wp_todo_task_flowsheet_nil_threshold_accessibility
string.context: Accessibility Text read by voiceover stating current progress or threshold value is nil or empty.

string.name: wp_todo_medscoach_title
string.context: Title for Meds Coach Activity

string.name: wp_todo_medscoach_medication_title
string.context: Title for the med grouping, %1$@ is the name of the notification group (e.g. morning)

string.name: wp_todo_medscoach_medication_subtitle_date
string.context: Subtitle text for the med grouping, used for by-end-of-day meds or meds with notification group without a time, %1$@ is for the date

string.name: wp_todo_medscoach_marknumtaken_button
string.context: Button text for the mark all as taken button, but show the actual number of meds that would be marked. %1$@ is the number of meds that will be marked

string.name: wp_todo_medscoach_bucket_status_all_med_remains
string.context: Meds bucket status string for when no meds in the bucket is taken or skipped. %1$@ is the number of medications left

string.name: wp_todo_medscoach_bucket_status_no_med_taken
string.context: Meds bucket status string for when no meds were taken (all skipped)

string.name: wp_todo_medscoach_bucket_status_all_med_taken
string.context: Meds bucket status string for when all meds were taken

resources.string: Todos los medicamentos han sido tomados

string.name: wp_todo_medscoach_bucket_status_all_meds_taken_and_nottaken
string.context: Meds bucket status string for when all meds are either taken or skipped. %1$@ is the number of medications taken, %2$@ is the number skipped

string.name: wp_todo_medscoach_bucket_status_all_meds_taken_and_remaining
string.context: Meds bucket status string for when all meds are either taken or still remains. %1$@ is the number of medications taken, %2$@ is the number remaining

string.name: wp_todo_medscoach_bucket_status_all_meds_nottaken_and_remaining
string.context: Meds bucket status string for when all meds are either not taken or still remains. %1$@ is the number of medications not taken, %2$@ is the number remaining

string.name: wp_todo_medscoach_bucket_status_all_meds_taken_nottaken_and_remaining
string.context: Meds bucket status string for when all meds are taken, not taken, or remains. %1$@ is the number of medications taken, %2$@ is the number not taken, %3$@ is the number remaining

string.name: wp_todo_medscoach_medsbucket_title
string.context: Title for meds bucket task

string.name: wp_todo_medscoach_footer_warning
string.context: Meds bucket warning string about potential incomplete med list

resources.string: Es posible que esté tomando otros medicamentos que no tienen recordatorios. Hable con su personal médico si no está seguro/a de qué medicamentos tomar.

string.name: wp_todo_medsgroup_instruction
string.context: The instruction for a meds group task

string.name: wp_todo_medsgroup_instruction_anticoag
string.context: The instruction for a meds group task when the task is for an anticoagulant order

resources.string: Tome según las instrucciones de la clínica de anticoagulación

string.name: wp_todo_medsgroup_title_reminder
string.context: The title for a group of med tasks that have different frequencies

string.name: wp_futureappointment_time_ondemand
string.context: appears as the time of the appointment for an on-demand video visit

string.name: wp_futureappointment_time_tbd
string.context: appears as the time of the appointment when the time is not yet determined

string.name: wp_futureappointment_show_arrival_time
string.context: Arrive by string for appointments. %1$@ is the arrival time.

string.name: wp_futureappointment_show_start_time
string.context: Start by string for appointment. %1$@ is the start time.

string.name: wp_futureappointment_show_join_time
string.context: Join by string for a video visit. %1$@ is the start time of the video visit.

string.name: wp_futureappointment_appointment_time_with_time_zone
string.context: Time string with time zone for appointments. %1$@ is the time. %2$@ is the time zone.

string.name: wp_past_medication_instructions
string.context: appears when the medication is overdue.

resources.string: Siga cualquieras instrucciones que le ha dado su proveedor sobre cómo tomar estos medicamentos si se ha olvidado una dosis.

string.name: wp_futureappointment_evisit_name
string.context: Default name to use for E-Visits.

string.name: wp_futureappointment_time_evisit
string.context: appears as the time of the appointment for an E-Visit. %1$@ is the name for E-Visits.

string.name: wp_todo_evisit_unread_response
string.context: appears as the display name of the appointment for an E-Visit that has an unread response from a provider. %1$@ is the name for E-Visits. %2$@ is the reason for E-Visit.

resources.string: Ver su nuevo mensaje sobre su %1$@ para %2$@

string.name: wp_todo_evisit_submitted
string.context: appears as the display name of the appointment for an E-Visit that has been submitted. %1$@ is the reason for E-Visit. %1$@ is the name for E-Visits. %2$@ is the reason for E-Visit.

string.name: wp_todo_evisit_not_submitted
string.context: appears as the display name of the appointment for an E-Visit that has not yet been submitted. %1$@ is the reason for E-Visit. %1$@ is the name for E-Visits. %2$@ is the reason for E-Visit.

string.name: wp_todo_evisit_pinit
string.context: appears as the display name of the appointment for an E-Visit that was ordered by a provider and has not yet been viewed. %1$@ is the reason for E-Visit. %1$@ is the name for E-Visits. %2$@ is the reason for E-Visit.

string.name: wp_todo_progress_title
string.context: Title for To Do Progress Activity

string.name: wp_todo_progress_range_last_week
string.context: Button to show to do progress over the last week

string.name: wp_todo_progress_range_last_month
string.context: Button to show to do progress over the last month

string.name: wp_todo_progress_range_last_three_months
string.context: Button to show to do progress over the last three months

string.name: wp_todo_progress_title_category_overall
string.context: Title for overall progress in to do

string.name: wp_todo_progress_title_category_general
string.context: Title for generic task progress in to do

string.name: wp_todo_progress_title_category_medications
string.context: Title for medication task progress in to do

string.name: wp_todo_progress_title_category_flowsheets
string.context: Title for flowsheet task progress in to do

string.name: wp_todo_progress_title_category_education
string.context: Title for education task progress in to do

string.name: wp_todo_progress_title_category_questionnaires
string.context: Title for questionnaire task progress in to do

string.name: wp_todo_progress_title_category_appointments
string.context: Title for appointment task progress in to do

string.name: wp_todo_progress_subtitle_no_tasks
string.context: Subtitle for a to do progress category with no tasks

string.name: wp_todo_progress_tasks_due_today
string.context: Label showing how many tasks in a particular category are due today. %1$@ is the number of tasks

string.name: wp_todo_progress_completion_accessibility_label
string.context: Label showing how many tasks have been completed out of the total number assigned. Formatted nicer for screen readers. %1$@ is the number of tasks completed, %2$@ is the total number assigned

string.name: wp_todo_progress_no_task_data_found
string.context: Toast message shown when no tasks data was loaded

resources.string: No se encontraron datos de tarea

string.name: wp_todo_progress_error_loading_task_data
string.context: Error message shown when task data could not be loaded

resources.string: Error al cargar los datos de la tarea

string.name: wp_manage_todo_reminders_label_patientcreatedtasks
string.context: The label for the button to access management for patient created tasks

string.name: wp_manage_todo_reminders_section_footer_patientcreatedtasks
string.context: Description for manage patient-created tasks activity

resources.string: Edite o elimine tareas que haya creado. Su equipo de atención podrá ver estas tareas, pero no podrá editarlas.

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtasks
string.context: Title for patient-created tasks activity

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtasks_empty
string.context: Message for the patient-created tasks activity which shows when the patient has zero created tasks.

resources.string: No ha hecho ninguna tarea para si mismo.

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtasks_proxy
string.context: Title for patient-created tasks activity. %1$@ is the patient's name

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtasks_empty_proxy
string.context: Message for the patient-created tasks activity which shows when the patient proxy has zero created tasks. %1$@ is the proxy's name

resources.string: %1$@ no ha creado ninguna tarea para sí.

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_nextduedate
string.context: Label for the next due date on a patient created task. %1$@ is the date (long format: En-US Nov 23, 1937) a task is next due

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_done
string.context: Label for the case when there is no instant for this task, in other words this task is finished or done.

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_create
string.context: The label for a button which creates a task when pressed.

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_delete_title
string.context: Delete alert message title

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_delete_body
string.context: Delete alert message body. Asks the user to confirm if they want to delete a task. %1$@ is the name of the task

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_delete_confirm
string.context: Delete alert option to confirming a task should be deleted when pressed

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_delete_cancel
string.context: Delete alert option to cancel deleting a task when pressed

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_create_success
string.context: Message which appears when a task is successfully created

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_delete_success
string.context: Message which appears when a task is successfully deleted

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_delete_fail
string.context: Message which appears when a task fails to delete

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_create_header
string.context: Header label for the navigation bar

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_create_name
string.context: Section label for entering a task name

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_create_description
string.context: Section label for entering a task description

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_create_when
string.context: Section label for entering what time a task will occur

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_create_recurrence
string.context: Section label for entering how much time will there be until a task repeats

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_create_time
string.context: Title label for selecting the task time

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_create_date
string.context: Title label for selecting the task date or start date

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_create_recurrence_label
string.context: Title label for selecting how long before the next task occurence

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_accessibility_edit
string.context: Accessibility text for the edit icon

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_accessibility_delete
string.context: Accessibility text for the delete icon

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_accessibility_when
string.context: Accessibility text for the when to send reminder input

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_create_no_recurrence
string.context: Title for the option to create a one off task. Such tasks dont repeat and can be also be seen as one time tasks.

plurals.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_create_recurrence_days
plurals.context: Title for the option to define the amount of time before a task repeats in days

plurals.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_create_recurrence_weeks
plurals.context: Title for the option to define the amount of time before a task repeats in weeks

plurals.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_create_recurrence_selection_days
plurals.context: Complete phrase for the user's selection of time between task recurrence. %1$@ is the number of days Param 1: Number of days

plurals.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_create_recurrence_selection_weeks
plurals.context: Complete phrase for the user's selection of time between task recurrence. %1$@ is the number of weeks Param 1: Number of weeks

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_create_save
string.context: Label for indicating changes will be saved when selected

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_create_submit
string.context: Title for the button to submit a task for creation

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_create_submit_error_name
string.context: Error message body shown when the name is too long. %1$@ is the maximum number of characters a name may hold

resources.string: Nombre no puede ser más de %1$@ caracteres

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_create_submit_error_description
string.context: Error message body shown when the description is too long. %1$@ is the maximum number of characters a description may hold.

resources.string: Descripción no puede ser más de %1$@ caracteres

string.name: wp_todo_patientcreatedtask_create_submit_fail
string.context: Error message shown when the task submission request fails

resources.string: Falló de entregar tarea. Por favor intente de nuevo.

string.name: wp_datetimepicker_buttonLeaveUnspecified
string.context: Button label that would clear out the current selection

string.name: wp_todo_empty_all_set
string.context: Text displayed to user when they do not have any tasks assigned to them/haven't created any of their own, letting them know they have nothing to complete

string.name: wp_todo_empty_no_tasks
string.context: Text displayed to user when they do not have any tasks assigned to them/haven't created any of their own

resources.string: No hay tareas para ver en este momento

string.name: wp_todo_empty_create_task
string.context: Message instructing user how to create a task when they have nothing listed in To Do

resources.string: Cree sus propias tareas tocando el botón Más a continuación

string.name: wp_todo_more_tab_title
string.context: Label for the More tab on the bottom navigation bar

string.name: wp_todo_bottomsheet_show_finished_tasks_header_text
string.context: Label of switch to toggle if finished tasks are visible/hidden

string.name: wp_todo_bottomsheet_create_task_helper_text
string.context: Text to help a user understand the purpose of the Create Task link in the More menu

resources.string: Añadir tareas personales a su lista de quehaceres.

string.name: wp_todo_bottomsheet_manage_reminders_helper_text
string.context: Text to help a user understand the purpose of the Manage To Do Reminders link in the More menu

resources.string: Decidir cuándo y cómo recibirá recordatorios para sus tareas.

string.name: wp_todo_bottomsheet_show_finished_tasks_helper_text
string.context: Text to help a user understand the purpose of the Show Finish Tasks switch in the More menu

resources.string: Ver lo que usted ya ha completado este día.

string.name: wp_todo_bottom_sheet_hide_accessibility_text
string.context: Label read in VoiceOver mode describing a button that hides the More tab menu.

string.name: wp_todo_bottom_sheet_toggle_accessibility_hint_text
string.context: Hint read in VoiceOver mode letting the user know they can double tap the screen to toggle a switch

string.name: wp_todo_bottom_sheet_answer_questionnaire_header_text
string.context: Header text on a link in the More menu that takes the user to an activity where they can answer their general persistent questionnaires

string.name: wp_todo_bottom_sheet_answer_questionnaire_helper_text
string.context: Text to help a user understand the purpose of the Answer a Questionnaire link the More menu

resources.string: Completar su cuestionarios generales en cualquier momento.

string.name: wp_todo_bottom_sheet_record_symptom_header_text
string.context: Header text on a link in the More menu that takes the user to an activity where they can answer their symptom check-in persistent questionnaires

string.name: wp_todo_bottom_sheet_record_symptom_helper_text
string.context: Text to help a user understand the purpose of the Record a Symptom link the More menu

resources.string: Completar su cuestionario de verificación de síntomas en cualquier momento.

string.name: wp_todo_questionnaire_submitted
string.context: Text that is displayed in a toast when the user completes a questionnaire through one of the ad hoc workflows from the More menu

string.name: wp_todo_questionnaires_list_activity_title
string.context: Title of the activity that displays a list of questionnaire tasks for a user to pick from

string.name: wp_todo_questionnaires_list_view_controller_title
string.context: Title of the view controller that displays a list of questionnaire tasks for a user to pick from

string.name: wp_todo_questionnaires_list_empty_text
string.context: Message displayed to the user when there are no questionnaire tasks to display

resources.string: No hay ningún cuestionario disponible para responder en este momento
